lines.text: declare long long variables n , d and ans and an array of long longs a with size 1000
lines.code: long long n , d , a [ 1000 ] , ans ;

lines.text: for integer i = 1 to n inclusive read a [ i ]
lines.code: for ( int i = 1 ; i <= n ; i ++ ) cin >> a [ i ] ;
for ( int i = 1 ; i <= n - 1 ; i ++ )

lines.text: increment ans if a [ i ] < a [ i + 1 ] - 2 * d
lines.code: if ( a [ i ] < a [ i + 1 ] - 2 * d ) ans ++ ;

lines.text: increment ans if a [ i + 1 ] > a [ i ] + 2 * d
lines.code: if ( a [ i + 1 ] > a [ i ] + 2 * d ) ans ++ ;

lines.text: increment ans if a [ i + 1 ] - a [ i ] = 2 * d
